verbs.description: [ARG0: Lankford] [V: downplayed] [ARG1: the findings of the Senate Intelligence Committee on which he sits] [ARGM-TMP: after that committee determined American intelligence officials were correct in their claim that Russia meddled in the 2016 presidential election to benefit Donald Trump] .
